mapper.insert: insert into COMPORE_RELATIVE_QUEUE (ID, RELATIONSHIP_ID, MATCH_MODE, MATCH_LIMIT, TOLERANCE, LAB_SERVER_NO, COMPARE_STATUS, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationshipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tolerance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{labServerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compareStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update COMPORE_RELATIVE_QUEUE set RELATIONSHIP_ID = #{relationshipId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATCH_MODE = #{matchMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATCH_LIMIT = #{matchLimit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOLERANCE = #{tolerance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAB_SERVER_NO = #{labServerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPARE_STATUS = #{compareStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, RELATIONSHIP_ID, MATCH_MODE, MATCH_LIMIT, TOLERANCE, LAB_SERVER_NO, COMPARE_STATUS, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON from COMPORE_RELATIVE_QUEUE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, RELATIONSHIP_ID, MATCH_MODE, MATCH_LIMIT, TOLERANCE, LAB_SERVER_NO, COMPARE_STATUS, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON from COMPORE_RELATIVE_QUEUE

SELECT count(*) from dna.COMPORE_RELATIVE_QUEUE crq left join dna.RELATIVE_RELATIONSHIP rr on rr.ID = crq.RELATIONSHIP_ID left join dna.sample_info si_1 on si_1.SAMPLE_ID = rr.SAMPLEA_ID left join dna.sample_info si_2 on si_2.SAMPLE_ID = rr.SAMPLEB_ID where 1=1
